changes: Magic Power Bonus When Fully Charged: 250% >> 200%
skills.name: Ale

Bane.summary: We've noticed that Bane's fully charged Skill venom deals excessive damage in Magic builds and is difficult to counter. To address this, we've reduced its Magic Power Bonus when fully charged.

Layla.summary: As a late-game Marksman, Layla's farming speed was greatly affected by the decrease in Gold from Minions. Therefore, we've slightly increased her damage in the mid to late game.

changes: Extra Max HP: 600 >> 1000-1200Extra Max HP Bonus: 30%-50% Extra Max HP >> 50% Extra Max HP
skills.name: Cauterant Inferno

Thamuz.summary: Thamuz currently takes too long to scale, making him unable to fulfill the Fighter/Tank role unti he has three or more equipment items. To address this, we've increased his early game survivability.

Creeps.description: Reduced Gold rewards from legend creeps in the early and mid game to provide more room for growth for late-game lineups

Lord.description:
Base Gold Reward: 80 >> 50
Gold Reward Increase Per Minute: 8 >> 10

Minions.description:
Increased the farming speed of Mid Lane heroes in the early to mid game to provide more viability for damage Mages
Ranged Minion Base Gold Reward: 21 >> 25

adjustments.description: Magic Defense Reduction per Stack: 3 + (0.3*Hero Level) >> 2.5 + (0.5*Hero Level)
adjustments.name: Unique Passive - Magic

Genius Wand.description: The late-game Magic Defense of some heroes has increased in recent patches, so we've increased this equipment's Magic Defense reduction effect in the late game.

adjustments.description: Magic Power: 75 >> 50
adjustments.name: Attribute

Glowing Wand.description: It is a bit too well-rounded as a utility Magic equipment, so we've reduced its damage capability.

adjustments.description: Base Damage: 170 >> 255
adjustments.name: Unique Passive - Magic

Lightning Truncheon.description: Compared to Wishing Lantern, Lightning Truncheon deals lower damage most of the time. Therefore, we've increased its damage in the early to mid game.

adjustments.description: 12% Spell Vamp >> 8% Spell Vamp
adjustments.name: Attributes

War Axe.description: War Axe was too well-rounded, providing Attack, HP, Cooldown Reduction, extra damage, and sustainability. Therefore, we've reduced its sustainability.

adjustments.description: Damage required to trigger Butterfly Goddess: 800 >> 900
adjustments.name: Unique Passive - Magic

Wishing Lantern.description: Reduced damage potential against low HP heroes.

adjustments.description: Cooldown: 13-10s >> 11-8.5s
Cooldown: 60-50s >> 50-40s

Baxia.description: Slightly reduced this hero's damage in the early game.

adjustments.description: Cooldown: 50-40s >> 56-48s

Kalea.description: Kalea's Ultimate is difficult to counter, so we've reduced its casting frequency.

adjustments.description: Cooldown: 27-21s >> 36-28s

Lancelot.description: After several nerfs, Lancelot remains too strong. We've reduced his Ultimate casting frequency to tone him down.

adjustments.description: Cooldown: 20-15s >> 30-24s

Lapu-Lapu.description: Lapu-Lapu becomes extremely powerful after activating his Ultimate. This adjustment aims to preserve this highlight experience while reducing the frequency of his Ultimate.

Ling.description: Increased Ling's combat capability in the mid to late game.

adjustments.description:
Slow Effect: 20% >> 30%
Cooldown: 60s-50s >> 55s-45s

Minsitthar.description: To allow Minsitthar to better restrict highly mobile heroes, we've enhanced the hero's utility and increased the cast frequency of his Ultimate.

adjustments.description: Cast Range: 5.7 >> 5.5

Yve.description: Yve's long cast range and Movement Speed Boost gave her excessive kiting ability, so we've made some adjustments.

changes: Movement Speed Stolen: 70 (+2* Hero Level) >> 50 (+2* Hero Level)
sections.name: Attributes

changes: Damage: 35% of damage taken (before reduction) >> 25% of damage taken (before reduction)
sections.name: Attributes

changes: Removed 8% Lifesteal.
sections.name: Attributes

changes: Basic Attacks grant 2% Lifesteal >> Each Basic Attack recovers (20+4* Hero Level) HP, and counts as an Attack Effect
sections.name: Unique Passive - Devour

changes: Optimized Queen's Wings' Passive - Demonize. This effect now requires taking damage from enemy heroes to trigger.
sections.name: Attributes

description: Different types of Roaming heroes have different playstyles, so we've reworked how some Roaming Blessings gain extra Gold and EXP.

As match time increases, Gold from minions and creeps rises, while vision reveals and damage opportunities for roamers decrease in the late game. Therefore, we've adjusted the reward values for Roaming heroes' different actions to balance the Gold income of different Roaming styles.

changes: No longer gains income from minions and creeps killed by nearby allies.
New Effect: Gain (30 + 2* Hero Level) Gold and (20 + 8* Hero Level) EXP after dealing damage to enemy heroes. Cooldown: 15s.
Gold Gained from Vision Reveal: 30 >> 30 (+ 1* Hero Level)
EXP Gained from Vision Reveal: 30 in first 2 min, 60 after 2 min >> 25 + (5* Hero Level)
Gold Gained Every 5s After 8 Min: 9 >> 10
EXP Gained Every 5s After 8 Min: 18 >> 20
sections.name: Conceal

changes: No longer gains income from minions and creeps killed by nearby allies.
New Effect: Gain (30 + 2* Hero Level) Gold and (20 + 8* Hero Level) EXP after dealing damage to enemy heroes. Cooldown: 15s.
Gold Gained from Vision Reveal: 30 >> 30 (+ 1* Hero Level)
EXP Gained from Vision Reveal: 30 in first 2 min, 60 after 2 min >> 25 + (5* Hero Level)
Gold Gained Every 5s After 8 Min: 9 >> 10
EXP Gained Every 5s After 8 Min: 18 >> 20
sections.name: Dire Hit

changes: Income from Minions and Creeps Killed by Nearby Allies: 40% >> 35%
Grants nearby allied heroes 20 Hybrid Defense.
Gold Gained from Vision Reveal: 30 >> 30 (+ 1* Hero Level)
EXP Gained from Vision Reveal: 30 in first 2 min, 60 after 2 min >> 25 + (5* Hero Level)
Gold Gained Every 5s After 8 Min: 9 >> 10
EXP Gained Every 5s After 8 Min: 18 >> 20
sections.name: Encourage

changes: Income from Minions and Creeps Killed by Nearby Allies: 40% >> 35%

EXP Gained from Vision Reveal: 30 in first 2 min, 60 after 2 min >> 25 + (5* Hero Level)
Gold Gained Every 5s After 8 Min: 9 >> 10
EXP Gained Every 5s After 8 Min: 18 >> 20

changes: Physical Attack: 40 >> 30
sections.name: Attributes

changes: Every 1% Lifesteal increases Hybrid Defense by 1 >> Every 4 extra Physical Attack increases Hybrid Defense by 1
sections.name: Unique Passive - Dragon Scale

changes: This effect now requires taking damage from enemy heroes to trigger.
sections.name: Unique Passive - Lifeline

description: Changed to [Mythical Honor Battlefield]. Mythic Battlefield's exclusive stat adjustments now only take effect after reaching Mythical Honor.

We've noticed that in high-rank matches, more Fighters are taking the Gold Lane, severely limiting the viability of Marksmen. Therefore, we've made Mythic Honor Battlefield adjustments to address this.

changes: Movement Speed Boost per Stack: 7.5% >> 5%
skills.name: Smart Heart

changes: Cooldown: 7s >> 8s
New Effect: When attached, this skill's cooldown is reduced by 50%.
skills.name: Love Waves

changes: Cooldown: 20s >>60s
Attaching State Duration: 12s >>20s
Shield Duration: 6s >> the shield remains until detached
Adjusted the cooldown mechanics to start immediately after casting the Ultimate.
skills.name: Heartguard

Angela.summary: Increased the duration of Angela's Ultimate when attached to allies and the cast frequency of Skill 1. Additionally, the cooldown now runs while attached. To balance, we've reduced the Movement Speed boost of the Passive and increased the cooldown of the Ultimate.

new_hero.description: Hero Feature: Adaptable cloud warrior with multiple combat styles.
new_hero.name: Sora

skills.description:
Sora can use his Ultimate to switch between Tank and Assassin styles. After ascending, dealing damage to heroes grants Cloudstep stacks that unlock different Ultimate effects.

Tank Style: Physical Attack converts to Max HP proportionally.

Assassin Style: Converts a portion of Max HP into Physical Attack.
skills.name: Mystic Surge

skills.description:
Sora strikes twice, dealing Physical Damage, then lunges forward and follows up with a straight punch.

Tank Style: Cannot move freely during the skill. Stuns the target when lunging forward.

Assassin Style: Can move freely during the skill. Deals 2 additional strikes and extends the range of the lunge.
skills.name: Sundering Strike

skills.description:
Sora leaps forward, stops when hitting an enemy hero or reaching max range to deal Physical Damage and slow the enemy.

Tank Style: The leap knocks enemies Airborne and knocks them back to the landing point. Landing at max range also knocks nearby enemies Airborne.

Assassin Style: The leap passes through the enemy hero and deals large AOE Damage and slows the enemies when reaching max range, and can be cast again within a short duration on hit.
skills.name: Skyfall

skills.description:
When fully stacked, swipe right to ascend into Tank Style. And after a brief delay, deals Physical Damage to all nearby enemies and pulls them in with a spinning vortex.

When fully stacked, swipe left to ascend into Assassin style. Gains a brief bonus Movement Speed and becomes untargetable, then continuously deals Physical Damage to all nearby enemies.

Stormbind (Tank Style Ultimate): Sora leaps and strikes the target area 5 times, stunning enemies. He can move freely during this skill.

Heaven's Wrath (Assassin Style Ultimate): Sora leaps and strikes the target area 15 times. He can move freely during this skill.
skills.name: Shifting Skies

new_hero.title: Shifting Cloud

changes: 12% Spell Vamp >> 10% Hybrid Lifesteal
sections.name: Attributes

changes: Cooldown: 18-8s â†’12-8s
skills.name: Bat Impact

Cecilion.summary: Optimized Cecilion's early-game skill casting experience, allowing him to cast skills more frequently.

changes: Movement Speed: 260 >> 250
skills.name: Base Stats

Cici.summary: Cici's Passive Delight granted her higher mobility than other Fighters. With the optimized decays, she could maintain high Movement Speed to support teammates. This posed too great a threat to backline heroes, so we've reduced her mobility and Skill 1 damage.

changes: Skill Recharge Time: 10s-6s >> 10s-5s
Cooldown: 2-1s >> 1.5-0.5s
skills.name: Grenade Bombardment

Clint.summary: We aim to increase the hero's sustained damage output in the mid to late game.

changes: Fixed an issue where Skill 1's damage did not scale with skill level.
skills.name: Valkyrie ShieldbindValkyrie Shieldbind

changes: Optimized Skill 2's control handling. It no longer hits targets behind the caster, which could cause the charge to fail.
skills.name: Valkyrie SlashValkyrie Slash

Freya.summary: After the revamp, Freya shifts from burst to sustained fights. She's now better suited for the following Equipment: Corrosion Scythe, Endless Battle, Sea Halberd, Malefic Roar, and Oracle. This build improves Freya's durability and consistent damage in team fights.

changes: Fixed an issue where the enhanced Basic Attack could ignore enemy defenses.
Enhanced Basic Attack Base Damage: 140 (+ 70% Total Physical Attack) (+ 9* Hero Level) >> 110 (+ 130% Total Physical Attack) (+ 12* Hero Level)
Base Damage to Enemies Behind the Target: 70 (+ 50% Total Physical Attack) (+ 7* Hero Level) >> 40 (+ 100% Total Physical Attack) (+ 10* Hero Level)
skills.name: Blessing of Wilderness

changes: Improved the description by adding a [Target's HP Percentage] row to the Ultimate's stats table, showing the extra damage per Wilderness Mark stack at each level.
skills.name: Power of Wildness

Hilda.summary: Fixed an issue where Hilda's enhanced Basic Attack ignored enemy defenses. We've also increased its damage and balanced her lane clearing efficiency and combat power in the early and late game.

changes: Enhanced Basic Attack Damage Against Creeps: 75% >> 85%
skills.name: Smith's Legacy

Julian.summary: Partially reverted Julian's Jungle efficiency adjustments to help him gain momentum sooner.

changes: Basic Attack Damage: 21% of Total Physical Attack + 26% of Total Magic Power >> 18% of Total Physical Attack + 24% of Total Magic Power
Enhanced Basic Attack Damage: 26% of Total Physical Attack + 31% of Total Magic Power >> 22.5% of Total Physical Attack + 30% of Total Magic Power
Attack Effects: 21% >> 24%
Enhanced Basic Attack Effects: 26% >> 30%
Cooldown: 10-8s >> 12-10s
skills.name: Chemical Refinement

Kimmy.summary: Slightly reduced Kimmy's dominance in the early to mid game.

changes: Cooldown: 10-7s >> 11-8.5s
skills.name: Thorned Rose

Lancelot.summary: Lancelot's Skill 2 had both high burst damage and the ability to evade enemy skills. The short cooldown made it difficult for enemies to counter. Therefore, we've increased its cooldown to reduce his margin for error.

changes: Cooldown: 2.5-1.5s >> 2.5-1s
skills.name: Expansion

changes: Cooldown: 2.5-1.5s >> 2.5-1s
skills.name: Gauge

Nolan.summary: Enhanced the hero's mobility and sustained combat capability in the mid to late game.

changes: Cooldown: 8.5s >> 8s
Slash Damage (Tap): 375-495 >> 375-555
skills.name: Blade Surge

changes: Cooldown: 8.5s >> 8s
skills.name: Soul Sever

changes: Cooldown: 8.5s >> 8s
skills.name: Evil Queller

Suyou.summary: Enhanced the hero's mobility and sustained combat capability in the mid to late game.

adjustments.description:
When entering a Bush, Hilda enhances her next Basic Attack to deal 140 (+ 70% Total Physical Attack) (+ 9*hero level) Physical Damage and slow the target by 40% for 3s. Enemies behind the target take 70 (+50% Total Physical Attack) (+ 7*hero level) Physical Damage. After using this enhanced Basic Attack, it enters a 6s cooldown.
Pursuit Speed of Enhanced Basic Attack: 10 >> 13
Each stack reduces the target's Physical Defense and Magic Defense by: 4% >> 3%
Hilda activates the runic power of her giant axe, increasing her Movement Speed by 60% and gaining a shield equal to 10-20% of her Max HP for 3s.
Reduced the foreswing of Skill 2's third attack by 33%.
Optimized the Ultimate's pursuit range and increased its hit rate after locking on.

Hilda.description:
Hilda's late-game minion clearing efficiency and durability are low, and she relies on Bushes to trigger her passive effect, leaving her with average performance in the Exp Lane.

So this time we redesigned Hilda's passive skill, changing the enhanced Basic Attack originally obtained from Skill 1 to entering a Bush, improving her Exp Lane presence and minion clearing efficiency. Meanwhile, Skill 1 has been redesigned to grant a shield and speed boost, reducing her dependence on bushes.

We've also optimized the control experience of Basic Attacks after Skill 2, improving passive stacking efficiency and combo smoothness.

To balance this, we've reduced how much the Passive Wilderness Mark reduces Physical & Magic Defense.

adjustments.description:
When Xavier hits an enemy hero with his skills, he gains 50% Movement Speed that decays over 1.2s. Each enemy hero hit by Xavier's skills generates one Energy charge. Upon reaching three charges, his next skill cast will enter the Transcendence state
Pursuit Speed of Enhanced Basic Attack: 10 >> 13
Each stack reduces the target's Physical Defense and Magic Defense by: 4% >> 3%
Skill Width in Normal State: 0.6 >> 0.9

Immobilizing Time: 1.2s >> 0.8s
Skill Width in Normal State: 3.5 >> 4.3
Skill Width in Transcendence State: 5.0 >> 4.3

Skill Width in Normal State: 2.2 >> 3.0
Skill Width in Transcendence State: 3.8 >> 3.0

Xavier.description:
Xavier relies on continuously hitting enemies with Skills 1 and 2 to enhance and enter the Transcendence state for stronger damage output. This doesn't align with our design expectations. Therefore, we've increased the width of all skills, changed Stage I to a permanent passive, and removed the original Stage II effect, allowing Xavier to enter the Transcendence state more quickly.

To balance this change, we've reduced the duration of Skill 2's immobilization.

adjustments.description:
Minotaur motivates for 3s after using the skill. When Enraged, the Regen effect is doubled.
[Motivation]: Recover HP equal to 5% of damage taken from enemy heroes (+1%*hero level).

Healing Range: Minotaur recovers himself and all surrounding allies >> Minotaur recovers himself and the ally with the lowest HP nerby.
Additional Lost HP Recovery: 5% >> 8%
Enraged: Remove previous Enraged effects. Now Minotaur recovers himself and all surrounding allies

Slow Effect: 40% >> 60%
Airborne Duration: 1s >> 0.8s

Minotaur.description:
As a tank-roaming hero, Minotaur's ability to provide healing and buffs to his team far exceeds his own survivability as a tank. We want his combat ability to better match his character.

We've revamped the original Enraged Regen effect that enhanced Skill 2 as Minotaur's new passive to improve his durability in combat.

We've also added Slow Effects to the first 2 hits of his Ultimate to improve the hit rate of the final hit's Airborne effect.

For balance, we have reduced Minotaur's ability to provide healing and buffs to allies, though he remains a unique tank with the ability to heal teammates.

adjustments.description:
Frigid Breath Range: 2 >> 3
Physical & Magical Defense Boost: 16-30 >> 20+0.5% Extra HP

Damage and Stun Range after Atlas Returns to Mecha: 2.5 >> 3
Stun Duration after Atlas Returns to Mecha: 1s >> 0.8s
Slow Range of the First Stage: 3.5 >> 3

Atlas.description:
Atlas's Skill 2 and Ultimate lack clear range indicators in actual combat to determine whether they can hit enemies.

So we've adjusted the ranges of his passive Frigid Breath, Skill 2's stun, and the Ultimate's first-stage slow effect to be completely consistent. Players can now use the visual effect circle of Frigid Breath as a range indicator for other skills, improving overall skill hit rate.

Additionally, the Physical & Magic Defense boost from Atlas's Passive cannot scale with his economic growth, so we've adjusted its numerical structure to scale based on his Extra HP.

To balance this change, we've slightly reduced the stun duration after Atlas returns to Mecha in Skill 2.

adjustments.description:
Sword Intent Gained from Dealing Damage: 30 >> 34
The detection time for entering the Swordout state when holding the Basic Attack button has beend reduced by 40%
When Benedetta is interrupted by control effects while charging Swordout Slash, the charge state will be interrupted, and her current Sword Intent will be retained. After the control effect ends, she needs to hold down Basic Attack again to enter the charge state.
When Benedetta is in Swordout state and gets controlled while Sword Intent decays, her Swordout state will be interrupted and restored to full Sword Intent. After the control effect ends, she needs to hold down Basic Attack again to enter the charge state.

Benedetta.description:
When Benedetta's skills hit consecutively, her Sword Intent accumulates quickly to full. However, holding the Basic Attack button to enter the Swordout state may affect the control experience of skill-combo transitions into Swordout Slash.

Therefore, we've shortened the detection time for entering the Swordout state when holding the Basic Attack button, allowing Benedetta to enter the state more quickly and improving control fluidity and responsiveness.

Additionally, after dealing damage 3 times with Basic Attacks or skills, Benedetta' Sword Intent gauge falls slightly short of being full, affecting the controls of her Swordout Slash combos.

Therefore, we've increased the amout of Sword Intent gained from dealing damage. It now only takes 3 hits from Basic Attacks or skills to fully charge her Sword Intent.

We've also fixed an issue where Benedetta would continue charging Swordout Slash after being interrupted by control effects, which could cause her to cast her it unintentionally once the control effect ended.

adjustments.description: Extra Attack at Full Stacks: 6 * Hero Level >> 8 * Hero Level

Damage: 800-1000 (+100% Total Physical Attack) >> 700-1100 (+120% Total Physical Attack)
Improved the visibilty of the target indicator for his Ultimate.
New Effect: Sky Piercer's damage will contribute to the activation of indicator effects on the target.

Martis.description: Increased Martis' damage in the mid-to-late game.

adjustments.description:
New Effect: Hitting an enemy hero reduces their Physical Defense by 40% for 3s.
Slow Effect: 60% for 2s >> 40% for 3s
Cooldown: 8-5s >> 8-6s

Balmond.description: We aim to slightly raise Balmond's control ceiling in high-level matches.

adjustments.description:
Cooldown: 11-8s >> 8-6s
New Effect: Returning to the hat's location with Skill 2 no longer cancels the Movement Speed boost.

New Effect: The ring of the fire will no longer be blocked by enemy heroes.
Foreswing: 0.4s >> 0.33s
Slow Effect: Slow enemy heroes by 40% for 1.5s >> Slow enemy heroes by 40% for 1.5s, decaying to 15% after 1.5s

Harley.description: Enhanced his mobility and the controls of his Ultimate.

adjustments.description: Removed the foreswing.

Faramis.description: Optimized Skill 2's Mana Cost and the controls of the Ultimate to make HP support for allies more timely.

adjustments.description: Cooldown: 7s at all levels >> 7-5s
Crescent Moon Damage: 20 (+35% Total Physical Attack) (+35% Total Magic Power) >> 20 (+35% Total Magic Power)

Chang'e.description: Chang'e's tower pushing efficiency in the early-mid game is too high compared to other Mages, so we reduced her enhanced Basic Attack Damage and balanced it by reducing Skill 1's mid-late game cooldown.

adjustments.description: New Effect: Increases Attack Speed by 30% after the Ultimate hits.

Obsidia.description: We aim to improve Obsidia's fighting capability when her Ultimiate hits in the early game, while reducing her damage output in the late game.

adjustments.description: Enhanced Basic Attack's Total Physical Attack Bonus: 140% >> 125%
Total Physical Attack Bonus: 110% >> 85%

Alucard.description: Alucard's scaling ability is too strong in the current patch, so we've reduced his mid to late-game damage to restore balance.

adjustments.description: Control Immunity Duration: 1s >> 0.4s (matching the dash duration)
Map Vision Duration: 5s >> 2s

Yi Sun-shin.description: Yi Sun-shin can trigger his Control Immunity too often and for too long, making him hard to counter. And we aim to reduce its duration while preserving his mobility.

Arlott.description: Arlott's damage was too high with the defense build, so we've slightly reduced his Base Damage.

adjustments.description: Stack Removal: 1 stack reduced every 1s >> 1 stack reduced every 0.3s

Cici.description: Cici's Delight stacks decay gradually when not dealing damage, granting her Movement Speed and Spell Vamp boost most of the time, making it difficult for enemies to counter. Therefore, we have increased the decay speed.

adjustments.description:
Extra Max HP: 600 >> 800-1200
Extra Max HP Bonus: 30%-50% Extra Max HP >> 50% Extra Max HP

Thamuz.description: Thamuz currently takes too long to scale, making him unable to fulfill the Fighter / Tank role until he has three or more equipment items. To address this, we've increased his early game survivability.

adjustments.description:
Magic Power Bonus: 65% >> 60%
Attack Effect Inherited: 65% >> 60%
Movement Speed Boost per Stack of Entanglement: 7.5% >> 5%
Magic Power Bonus: 130% >> 120%

Magic Power Bonus of Launching Gravitational Attractor: 65% > 60%
Magic Power Bonus of Attractor Detonation: 13% >> 12%
Additional Note: The previously announced Attack Speed adjustments for Natan's Entanglement were not implemented in the current patch. The related announcement has since been removed. Please refer to the actual in-game values for information.

Natan.description: Decreased the hero's mid-to-late game damage potential.

adjustments.description: Base Damage of Empowered Crossbow Shot: 120-200 >> 100-160

Irithel.description: Decreased Irithel's mid-to-late game damage potential.

adjustments.description: Physical Attack Growth: 8.5 >> 10

Layla.description: As a late-game Marksman, Layla's farming speed was greatly affected by the decrease in Gold from Minions. Therefore, we've slightly increased her damage in the mid to late game.

adjustments.description: Magic Power Bonus When Fully Charged: 250% >> 200%

Bane.description: We've noticed that Bane's fully charged Skill 2 venom deals excessive damage in Magic builds and is difficult to counter. To address this, we've reduced its Magic Power Bonus when fully charged.

adjustments.description: Max HP: 250 >> 0 Physical Defense: 55 >> 40 Magic Defense: 0 >> 40 Unique Passive - Arctic Cold REMOVED
Unique Passive - Frost Shield NEW
For each enemy hero within 5 units, Physical & Magic Defense is increased by 8, up to 40.
Max HP: 250 >> 0 Physical Defense: 18 >> 20 Magic Defense: 0 >> 20 Unique Passive - Arctic Cold REMOVED
Unique Passive - Frost Shield NEW
For each enemy hero within 5 units, Physical & Magic Defense is increased by 4, up to 20.
Unique Passive - Recovery NERF
Removed in-combat HP Regen effect. Unique Passive - Defender NEW
Upon taking more than 500 damage in a single instance, the excess damage beyond that amount is reduced by (20 + 0.3% Max HP)%

Guardian Helmet.description: Moved the excess damage reduction effect from Twilight Armor to Guardian Helmet and removed the in-combat HP Regen effect for balance.

adjustments.description: Attributes HP: 1200 >> 900
Physical Defence: 15 >> 40 Unique Passive - Redemption BUFF
HP Regen Time: 3s >> 2s Unique Passive - Twilight REMOVED Unique Passive - Chastise NEW
Taking damage will reduce the Attack Speed and Attack Speed cap of the attack to 75% of normal for 2s.

Chastise Pauldron.description:
Replaced Twilight Armor

Enhanced the Attack Speed reduction and moved it from Dominance Ice to Chastise Pauldron.

optimizations: Revamped Balmond's in-match and out-of-match art assets for an improved visual presentation.
Optimized the visual clarity of in-match indicators.
Optimized the visual effects of the following Equipment: Blade of the Heptaseas, Starlium Scythe, Athena's Shield, and Cursed Helmet.
Fixed an issue where Wanwan would still dash if her Basic Attack missed a target while Tiger Pace was active, but no stacks were consumed.

adjustments: Adjusted the difficulty of some daily events. You can now earn rewards from fewer matches. Battle Chest, Free Chest, and Daily Quest are now included in the Bang Bang Card system. You'll get a Bang Bang Card after each match and obtain a random reward from it. There are also chances to directly obtain a skin or a hero.
Adjusted the Main Interface layout and visuals, improving art quality and text clarity. Adjusted the entry location for some features to improve usability.
In Lane Matchmaking, players can select only one lane when choosing [Needed Lane].

Freya.description: Hero Feature: A female warrior who infuses weapons with the Power of Einherjar for sustained combat..

adjustments.description: Freya can store up to 6 Sacred Orbs. Each Basic Attack grants 1 Sacred Orb, and they gradually recover when out of combat. Consuming 1 Sacred Orb grants Freya 100% Attack Speed Bonus for her next Basic Attack.
Freya leaps to the target area and strikes the ground with her shield, gaining a shield and dealing Physical Damage to enemies within and knocking them airborne.
Freya charges forward and slashes, dealing Physical Damage. This skill has no base cooldown but consumes 2 Sacred Orbs per cast.

Freya selects a target area and dives down, dealing Physical Damage and slowing enemies along the path and at the landing point. Upon landing, Freya enters the Valkyrie state, during which her Basic Attacks deal increased damage, recover HP, and deal splash damage.
New Effect: Gains 8% Movement Speed while Blood Banquet is active.
Cooldown: 18-8s â†’ 12-8s

Alice.description: Alice's mobility in the early-mid game was too weak, so we've strengthened her mobility when her passive is activated.

adjustments.description: Shield: 10% >> 14%
Extra Physical Attack Bonus: 130% >> 120%
